data.title: Benefits Enrollment Center : Services for You : Aster Aging, Inc.
data.text:
BENEFITS ENROLLMENT CENTER

As part of the National Council on Aging's network, Aster is a certified Benefits Enrollment Center. As a BEC, we offer free, confidential services that help individuals on Medicare connect with resources that help them afford health care, prescriptions, food, utilities, and more.

Some of these supports include:

Medicare Part D Extra Help

Medicare Savings Program

Medicaid/AHCCCS

SNAP

LIHEAP

Our Outreach Specialists can help you complete applications, enroll in services, and navigate benefits. To get started, complete the form below or call us today at 480-634-1659.

hr5ppvj7ofsb

Please share a brief message about how we may assist you.

A member of our team will contact you as soon as possible. Thank you!

Aster Aging is a Benefits Enrollment Center designated by the National Council on Aging and can help older adults and people with disabilities learn about public benefits programs, be screened for eligibility, and receive assistance in enrolling at community-based locations.

BECs are supported with funding from the U.S. Administration for Community Living (ACL) as part of NCOA's MIPPA Resource Center. For more information on Benefit Enrollment Centers, please visit https://www.ncoa.org/centerforbenefits/becs/
